Key Match Events: England won the first T20I by eight wickets.
Shreyas Iyer scored 67 runs off 48 balls.
Jason Roy scored 49 runs off 32 balls.
Jofra Archer took 3 wickets for 23 runs.
Washington Sundar took the wicket of Jason Roy.
Yuzvendra Chahal took the wicket of Jos Buttler.
India posted a total of 124/7 in 20 overs.
England chased down the target of 125 in 15.3 overs.
Pre-Game Insights: England won the toss and elected to bowl first.
Eoin Morgan mentioned the importance of evolving in their game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at the newly-named Narendra Modi Stadium in Ahmedabad.
The Gujarat Cricket Association allowed 50 percent of spectators during the series due to the pandemic.
